name: The Frootinis
description:
The Frootinis are a peaceful race of creatures who live in a quiet little town... but one day their peace is shattered by an evil wizard.

Control both hands of the Frootinis independently of each other to navigate around levels, dodge traps and ultimately escape from the wizard!

Made in 15 hours 20 minutes for #GMCJam 39 where the theme was "Pathetic Creature".
